tags.param:
props.variant Sets the variant for the Banner.
props.image Illustration that will replace default Icon when the prop is supplied.
props.dismissible Determines whether or not the Banner is dismissible.
props.onClose Callback fired when dismiss button is clicked.
props.darkMode Determines whether or not the component will be rendered in dark mode.
props.baseFontSize The base font size of the title and text rendered in children.

description: Banners remain until dismissed by the user, or if the state, which caused the banner is resolved. They are usually contextual to the product or task. For guidelines on when to use Banners, refer to our [design guidelines](https://www.mongodb.design/component/banner/guidelines/).

variant.name: variant
variant.description: Sets the variant for the Banner

image.name: image
image.description: Illustration that will replace default Icon when the prop is supplied

dismissible.name: dismissible
dismissible.description: Determines whether or not the Banner is dismissible

onClose.name: onClose
onClose.description: Callback fired when dismiss button is clicked

baseFontSize.name: baseFontSize
baseFontSize.description: The base font size of the title and text rendered in children.

darkMode.name: darkMode
darkMode.description: Renders the component with dark mode styles.
